name: Blood Rush (nef.vgs, MarmotteQuantique)
description:
Blood Rush is a game about cleaning the remainder of humankind. To cleanse, you must destroy. And to destroy you need blood collection.

You once were a robot with no courage, but now it's time for payback!

Controls :

  • A & D to move
  • Space to jump
  • Left Shift + direction to dash
  • Left Mouse Button to normal attack
  • Right Mouse Button to Riff Attack

Tips :

⚠️Attack the Boss on the beat of the music to fill your combo bar and unleash your true power

In the Hub you can unlock new boss by crafting, setting upgrades on your guitare and refill your HP using the blood you collected. If you're lost Moody will always help you (in exchange of small part of your soul).

This game has been made on Unity 2021.3.15f1 for the Boss Rush Jam 2023.
